full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Secure Storage and Transportation Services**
===========================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-555-8120244

**Procurement:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Publication Date:** April 24, 2024

**Proposal Deadline:** May 14, 2024, at 14:00 (local time)

**Contract Terms:**

* Contract Start Date: May 31, 2024
* Contract End Date: June 30, 2024

**Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Cost-per-Point
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Supply and Services:**

The Government of Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of secure storage and transportation services for the relocation of sensitive files from one site to another in St. John's, New Brunswick.

**Services Requirements:**

* Package and unpack sensitive files up to Protected "B" level
* Provide secure transportation services for the relocation of files from site A to site B
* Site A: Sir Humphrey Gilbert Building, 165 Duckworth St, St. John's, NL, A1A 2Y5
* Site B: St. John's Management Centre, 689 Topsail Road, St. John's, NL A1E 2E3

**Bidder Information:**

* Contact: Mykola Polataiko, nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca, (999) 999-9999
* Documents: Available on the Government of Canada's procurement website

**Proposal Requirements:**

Bidders must provide a detailed proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and costs for delivering the required services. The proposal must be submitted electronically in PDF format. The RFP document is available on the Government of Canada's procurement website.

**Note:**

* This is a competitive procurement, and the lowest bidder will be awarded the contract.
* The contract will be for a fixed term of three months, with the option to extend up to six months.

We look forward to receiving your proposal. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the procurement officer listed above. Thank you. 
**Nomination** 
[\*[*company Name] has been downgraded to ***[\*[*bidder name]]*** to remove mention of the company but leave bidder name] .**
